expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure
expectations.evidence: Codebase Structure section with tree diagram + Architecture subsection

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Build and Run, Testing, Linting sections

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies
The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Database Setup subsection with db:migrate, db:seed, db:studio

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
Commands are formatted as bullet list items
expectations.evidence: All commands in ```bash code blocks throughout
